mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, user_id, username, password, description, pic_url, create_time, edit_time, version, state) values (#{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR})

user_id,

mapper.update:
update t_user
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id from t_user where id = (select MAX(id) from t_user)
